title: Cant login, Cant reinstall, Cant check server status
body:
For whatever reason, the League client is not letting me sign into my account. After waiting a while and trying a few times I decided to delete the client and reinstall it. Then when I went to the LoL website to re download the client, its not letting me download and the page crashes after i press the download button. Any thoughts on what i should do?

Note: Every time i try to download the game, the error reads: 
> riotgamespatcher-a.akamaihd.net took too long to respond.

replies.body:
Hey there,

That's quite odd, I was able to just download the patcher myself without issues.
Could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) for me, let me know if this helps.
